逫字的基本解释

逫
zhú
〔逫律〕缓吹，如“气旁迕以飞射兮，驰散涣以逫逫。”
急走的样子。

逫字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhú］
［《廣韻》竹律切，入術，知。］
见“逫律”。

逫字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【辵字部】　逫； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1259第12
【玉篇】吉穴切，音決。遠也。　又【廣韻】【集韻】?竹律切，音㤕。【廣韻】走貌。【集韻】趨也。　又逫律，氣出遲貌。【王褒·洞簫賦】馳散渙以逫律。

逫字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
逫字的起名意思

暂无。

逫
Basic explanation of words
逫
zhú
〔逫耫〕 Blow slowly, as in "Fly away from the breath, and swiftly disperse in order to get rid of it."
Anxiously walking.
逫
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhú］
["Guangyun" bamboo rhythm cut, enter the technique, know. ]
See "Law".
逫
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 2] [The Department of Characters] 　逫; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 1259 No. 12
[Jade articles] Ji acupoint cuts, sound is determined. Far too.　 [Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Bamboo rhythm cut, sound 㤕. [Guang Yun] Take a look. [Jiyun] Trending too.　Rhythm again, anger is out of time. [Wang Bao·Dongxiao Fu] Disperse and follow the rules.
